name: Jump Quest (Jingen)
description:
A short first person platformer I made when I first started learning Unreal Engine. 3 levels of tight platforming with various mechanics.

Controls

Movement - WASD

Jump - Space Bar

Sprint - Left Shift

Crouch - Left Ctrl

Slide - Sprint + Crouch

Grappling Hook - Right Mouse Button

No Pause Menu (You gotta alt-f4 to quit out sorry :p)
